==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is possibly a reference to the {{w|Judgement of Paris}}, a story from Greek mythology in which Eris, the Greek goddess of discord, bitter about not being invited to a wedding, throws a golden apple inscribed with the words "To the fairest one" into the proceedings, intending to sow disharmony between the other goddesses in attendance.
